# Class TextAggregatorNode

Text aggregator node for combining multiple text pieces into a single text output. This node processes various text inputs and combines them into a unified text result.

#### Input

[TextData](./common_data_types_external_text_data.TextData) | [TextStreamData](./common_data_types_external_text_stream_data.TextStreamData) | [LLMChatResponseData](./common_data_types_external_llm_chat_response_data.LLMChatResponseData) \- The data type that TextAggregatorNode accepts as input

#### Output

[TextData](./common_data_types_external_text_data.TextData) \- The data type that TextAggregatorNode accepts as output

#### Example


```
const aggregatorNode = new TextAggregatorNode(&#123;  id: 'my-aggregator-node',  reportToClient: true&#125;);

```
